escape_characters_example.double_quotes: This is a string with escaped double quotes: "Hello, World!"
escape_characters_example.backslash: This is a string with an escaped backslash: C:\Program Files\
escape_characters_example.forward_slash: This is a string with an escaped forward slash: http:\/\/example.com
escape_characters_example.newline:
This is a string with a newline character: Line 1
Line 2
escape_characters_example.tab: This is a string with a tab character: Before	After
escape_characters_example.unicode: This is a string with an escaped Unicode character: \u00A9 (Copyright symbol)
